name: biomni-search-google
title: Biomni: Search Google
description: Perform Google web search and return results with titles, URLs, and descriptions.
content:
Overview

Perform general Google web search to find information across the internet. Returns search results with titles, URLs, and descriptions from webpages, allowing broad information discovery beyond academic databases and scientific literature sources.

Input Parameters

  • query (required): Search query string
  • num_results (optional): Number of search results to return (default: 10)
  • language (optional): Language code for search results (default: "en" for English)

Input Format

{
  "query": "bioinformatics software tools genomics",
  "num_results": 10,
  "language": "en"
}

Biological Use Case

Useful for finding diverse web-based resources beyond traditional academic literature. Use cases include: locating bioinformatics software tools and databases, finding lab protocols and technical resources, discovering biotech company information and products, identifying conference websites and call for papers, locating research group websites and contact information, finding educational resources and tutorials, and accessing government databases and regulatory information. Complements academic database searches by including commercial resources, technical documentation, and grey literature.

Output

Returns a text file (google_results.txt) containing formatted search results with page titles, URLs, and brief descriptions for each result. Results are ordered by Google's relevance ranking.

Category

literature
